verbs.description: The North American bid [V: has] faced questions about the impact of attempts by President Donald Trump to implement a ban on travel to the US by residents of six majority - Muslim countries .

[ARG0: The North American bid] has [V: faced] [ARG1: questions about the impact of attempts by President Donald Trump to implement a ban on travel to the US by residents of six majority - Muslim countries] .

The North American bid has faced questions about the impact of attempts by [ARG0: President Donald Trump] to [V: implement] [ARG1: a ban on travel to the US by residents of six majority - Muslim countries] .
